extendedInfo.description: *Take control of your D-Power digivice and battle wild digimon! *Collect items to help your digimon become stronger!Notes: -Be sure to click the SAVE ICON on the top right hand corner often because there is NO AUTOSAVE at the moment.-Camera is currently down at the moment. but will be fixed soon.-The app does require an internet connection to run properly.-This is an HTML5 based game. It works  best on Android 4.0 and higher.If this version runs smoothly for you then please try the full version for $0.99.How to play: -Start by starting a new game and choose one of the three starter Digimon.-You will then be able to scan your surroundings for wild Digimon and battle them.-On defeating wild Digimon you will gain Experience which will allow you to level up.-Upon reaching level 11, 25, 41 you will be able to Digivolve your Digimon by going to the "Partner" page and clicking on the  Blue Card on the bottom right of the screen.-You will also receive "Bits" which is the currency of the game that you can use to buy upgrades or items to make your Digimon stronger.-In the shop there are 3 options to choose from: Cards (Left) , Digivice Upgrades (Right), & Digimon Upgrades (Bottom).-You can use card in battle to help defeat enemy Digimon and will come in handy if your opponents attribute has an advantage over you.-You can use Digivice Upgrades to scan for stronger Digimon.-You can buy Digimon Upgrades to add Health and Attack points to your Digimon.-To Equip your Digimmon upgrades go to the "Digivice" screen and click on 1 of the 3 empty slots at the bottom and you can see your inventory of upgrades to equip.-You can also hatch Digimon by receiving their DigiEgg in battle.-Once you have a DigiEgg, go to the "Incubator" screen and click on the machine on the right. There you will choose what Egg you would like to hatch. -You will need Data Chips in order to Hatch Digimon which you can get from normal DigiEggs.-If you Successfully hatch a Digimon you can go back to the "Incubator" screen and click on the machine on your left to see your Digimon Storage. This is where you can swap between Digimon.Strengths and Weaknesses: Data > VaccineVaccine > VirusVirus > DataIf your Digimon has an advantage over your opponents type you will get an attack boost and their attack will be cut. If your cards type has an advantage over your opponents then the cards effect will be doubled.
